data.Name: Dave Martone
data.Bio: Dave Martone is a Canadian guitarist and renowned instructor who releases instrumental rock songs under the name martone. His band is not permanent, but he has previously collaborated with Daniel Adair from Nickelback (drums) David Spidel (bass) and his brother Paul Martone (keyboard). He has also played with Mike Portnoy of Dream Theater. His latest album is titled "Clean". Read more on Last.fm
